settings.field_helptext: If your name is not Bob, please contact support

settings.field_placeholder: Really Bob, we are so interested in what you have to say!

settings.field_helptext: Whoever bought your mailaddress however, will

field_option.value: Too good to be true (yes, it will break again soon)

settings.field_name: How would you rate our support?

field_option.value: At my (girl)friends place, but please tell my wife I'm at work

settings.field_name: Yeah just send us your CV, why not

settings.field_value: At the end of the world...
